title: Provides for the establishment of a program to certify certain feed mills, farms, and sellers of food products which produced or used feed that does not contain anim
summary: Provides for the establishment of a program to certify certain feed mills, farms, and sellers of food products which produced or used feed that does not contain animal parts.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to development of a program to certify certain feed mills, animals and food products and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing an animal feed certification and registration fund
